title: Print, "Greetings from Gustav Jensen"
description: This head-and-shoulders view of a female in right profile is a design for a greeting card. The line drawing, lacking shading, emphasizes the sculptural quality of the facial features: the eye sockets are blank, the cheekbone incised by two intersecting curved lines. The hair is styled in a wave next to the face and over the ear, and then pulled at the back of the neck into a chignon. The whole is enclosed within a thin rectangular border, and just above the bottom line of the border Greetings from Gustav Jensen is imprinted in small Art Deco style capitals.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Greetings from Gustav Jensen". 23.7 x 20.4 cm (9 3/8 x 8 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-143.
